original_text: Many nations are in the Valley of Jehoshaphat. It is there that the day of the Lord will soon come. Many nations are in the Valley of Jehoshaphat. It is there that the day of the Lord will soon come. Many nations are in the Valley of Jehoshaphat.
korean_text: 사람이 많음이여, 심판의 골짜기에 사람이 많음이여, 심판의 골짜기에 여호와의 날이 가까움이로다

sentences.original_text: Many nations are in the Valley of Jehoshaphat
It is there that the day of the Lord will soon come
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳에서 주의 날이 곧 올 것입니다
